author: benh
msg: Fixed Allocator Test to use DROP_MESSAGE, FutureArg, moved
expectations closer to actions, etc. Additionally, replaced the
MockAllocator in DRFAllocatorTest with a regular Allocator because the
expectations were uninteresting, expectations on calls to the
allocator are covered in other tests, and it just made the test a lot
messier.
From: Thomas Marshall <twm378@gmail.com>
Review: https://reviews.apache.org/r/10329

author: benh
msg: Fixed exception tests to use the latest test abstractions.
From: Jiang Yan Xu <yan@jxu.me>
Review: https://reviews.apache.org/r/10318

author: ehatcher
msg: merge from r1467413
* SOLR-4680: Correct example spellcheck configuration's queryAnalyzerFieldType and
use "text" field instead of narrower "name" field (ehatcher, Mark Bennett)
* SOLR-4702: Fix example /browse "Did you mean?" suggestion feature. (ehatcher, Mark Bennett)
(note, I don't have JDK7 available currently, but merge from 4x r1467413 looks good)

author: julianfoad
msg: Post-branch housekeeping.  Having branched 1.8.x from trunk, increment the
trunk minor version number to 9.
* subversion/include/svn_version.h,
subversion/tests/cmdline/svntest/main.py,
build/run_tests.py
(SVN_VER_MINOR): Bump to 9.

author: julianfoad
msg: Create the release branch for the 1.8.x stabilization and release.
